Articles.Content:
I've been playing this for a while now, already been to Duna!!

I really wanted to register, so I did, you'll hopefully see more of me!! ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

Peace!

Hey! I have also been playing for a while now. 

Welcome to the forum. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Welcome! I hope you enjoy the community here as much as I have. 

See you around!
Welcome aboard, ollymonger! Hope to see you somewhere, soon. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
